attributes.additional_details:
If other countries can have £1 p/L cheaper fuel then why can’t we? 
Decrease tax and VAT on fuel. 
Negotiate cheaper fuel prices with companies that make billions in profits.
Regulators to step in and ensure forecourts aren’t charging over the odds (which we have all seen them do!!).
attributes.background:
Reduce fuel costs across the U.K. 
Petrol and diesel have increased by marginal amounts to the point where people can’t afford.
We are one of the most extensive in the world - 150/170 and with the cost of living increasing daily something needs to be done as the majority can’t afford the increase.

rejection.details:
The Government is not directly responsible for the price of fuel, but we have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Set up an independent regulator to monitor and regulate vehicle fuel pricing: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/605282

Reduce fuel duty and VAT by 40% for a period of 2 years: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/599089
